Text: is this for the rosetta stone version 2 or 3 ??
No idea, i know that it works though
There are no v3 levels released for Dutch yet, so these are V2.

Rosetta Stone have no plans to release level 3, the guy I spoke to claims that level 1 + 2 will be enough to get you up to conversation level in up to 450 hours of lessons.

Bought as a single package, these programs cost £229, seperately £308.

I've been working on it for an hour a day for about 2 weeks now and I'm delighted with my progress.

I had problems at first but found that it works well with MagicDisc if anyone has problems.

All in all, works a treat. Superb up Dybowski!
This is learning level 1 & 2. But what software version is it? v2.x or v3.x?

i just downloaded this. it had a hard time extracting with the program i was using so i used WinRAR. either way, once unpacked and burnt onto a disc, it is detected by the rosetta stone software. however, when any of the lessons are clicked on it says there is a script error. esentially, this is worthless and completely unusable because non of the lessons work.

BOTTOM LINE: DO NOT DL THIS

Works fine with: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4454940/Rosetta_Stone_Compressed
(couldn't get the included Dutch to work) However you need to keep the CD or iso mounted for this to work.
